title: Which country has lost the most wars? - Quora

response.answer_text: Last century, its hard to choose which Middle-Eastern nation suffered more defeats than others. However, historically, look to large empires that fell to conquest over time. My vote is for the Byzantine/Roman empire. Especially the Byzantines. The Romans didnt lose many wars. Those they didnt win were mostly just truces. It wasnt until the fall of the Western empire that wars were truly lost. Or one war. Against the invading barbarian hordes. However, Eastern Rome and the Byzantine Empire lost wars to almost everyone, including the 4th crusade. Whoops
